name: Battle Island (NoamZeise)
description:
Do you have what it takes to defeat your opponent?

=======================================================

Left in charge of a group of soldiers, with a city to protect, can you defeat the enemy and destroy their city before they do the same to you?

Made in 1 week for GBJam9

Game

--------------------------------

Battle Island is a turn based strategy played against a single AI oponnent, taking place on a procedurally generated island (either small, medium or large)

A player controls units and a city:

units get 2 moves per turn and can:

  • move
  • rest  (costs 2 moves, replenishes one soldier)
  • gather resources (automatically sent to city)
  • fight enemy units/city (does 1 dmg per hit)

cities get 1 move and can build units (costs 3 resources - will have 3 hp)

the player can select a unit or city at any time, but only possible actions will be shown for the unit to take. (eg can't fight without a target within range)

Once a player has no more possible actions, their turn is automatically passed to the enemy, or the player can manually pass by selecting the option from the options menu (B to open).

Controls

-----------------------------------------------

d-pad  ->  wasd        ----->   navigate map / menus

A -> comma              ----->   select unit / choose option

B -> full stop             ----->   open options menu / exit any menu

start -> Esc                ----->   stop/start music

select -> Enter           ----->   free camera
